providers.name: Deutsche Bahn
providers.description: Deutsche Bahn is Germany's national railway company, offering comprehensive train services across the country and Europe.
providers.advantages: Extensive network coverage with modern trains and excellent service
refunds: Full refund up to 24 hours before departure
Partial refund up to 12 hours before departure

providers.name: Trainline
providers.description: Trainline is Europe's leading train and bus app. Book rail and coach travel across Europe.
rules: Advance booking required for best prices
E-tickets must be downloaded before travel
Seat reservations mandatory for certain routes
providers.advantages: Specialized in train travel with best prices and real-time updates

providers.name: FlixBus
providers.description: FlixBus is a leading bus operator in Germany, offering affordable travel options across Europe.
providers.advantages: Affordable travel with modern amenities and extensive network
refunds: Free cancellation up to 15 minutes before departure

providers.name: Direct Ferries
providers.description: Direct Ferries is the world's largest ferry ticket booking site, offering ferry crossings worldwide.
rules: Vehicle dimensions must be provided at booking
Cabin booking recommended for night journeys
Passport/ID required for all international routes
providers.advantages: Comprehensive ferry services with extensive route network
